#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
        int f[88],i,t;
        f[0]=1,f[1]=1;
        for(i=2;i<88;i++){
            f[i]=f[i-1]+f[i-2];
            if(f[i]>26)
                f[i]=f[i]%26;
        }
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--){
            int n;
            scanf("%d",&n);
            for(i=0;i<n;i++){
                printf("%c",f[i]+64);
            }
            printf("\n");
        }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
